languages.text: {n}Высокий мужчина жестом останавливает вас на подходе. Кровь — собственная и чужая — стекает по его изможденному лицу, покрытому перламутровой чешуей. Два застланных тьмой глаза не мигая осматривают вас, а третий, отпечаток судьбы {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g}, угрожающе подрагивает за опущенным веком посреди лба.{/n} "Назад! Или, клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}, я обрушу на вас весь ужас {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Океана Душ{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Высокий мужчина жестом останавливает вас на подходе. Кровь — собственная и чужая — стекает по его изможденному лицу, покрытому перламутровой чешуей. Два застланных тьмой глаза не мигая осматривают вас, а третий, отпечаток судьбы {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатора{/g}, угрожающе подрагивает за опущенным веком посреди лба.{/n} "Назад! Или, клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}, я обрушу на вас весь ужас {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Океана Душ{/g}!"

languages.text: {n}A tall man stops you with a gesture when you approach. Blood is trickling down the pearly scales of his weary face, and not just his own blood. Two jet-black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} upon you! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий мужчина жестом останавливает вас на подходе. Кровь — собственная и чужая — стекает по его изможденному лицу, покрытому перламутровой чешуей. Два застланных тьмой глаза не мигая осматривают вас, а третий, отпечаток судьбы {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g}, угрожающе подрагивает за опущенным веком посреди лба.{/n} "Назад! Или, клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}, я обрушу на вас весь ужас {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Океана Душ{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}A tall man stops you with a gesture when you approach. Blood is trickling down the pearly scales of his face, both other people's and his own. Two jet black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ocean of Souls{/g} upon you, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

{n}A tall man stops you with a gesture when you approach. Blood is trickling down the pearly scales of his face, both other people's and his own. Two jet black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ocean of Souls{/g} upon you, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

Or I will unleash all horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ocean of Souls{/g} upon you! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

Two jet-black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} upon you! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

{n}A tall man stops you with a gesture when you approach. Blood is trickling down the pearly scales of his weary face, and not just his own blood. Two jet-black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} upon you! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

languages.text: {n}Ein großer Mann hält dich mit einer Geste auf, als du dich näherst. Blut tropft die perlmuttfarbenen Schuppen seines erschöpften Gesichts hinab, und nicht nur das seine. Zwei pechschwarze Augen beobachten jede deiner Bewegungen, ohne zu blinzeln. Das dritte, das Mal eines {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, pulsiert bedrohlich hinter dem geschlossenen Lid in der Mitte seiner Stirn.{/n} "Tretet zurück! Sonst entfessle ich die Schrecken des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Meers der Seelen{/g} und jage sie auf Euch! So wahr der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} mir helfe!"
languages.original_text: {n}A tall man stops you with a gesture when you approach. Blood is trickling down the pearly scales of his weary face, and not just his own blood. Two jet-black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} upon you! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein großer Mann hält dich mit einer Geste auf, als du dich näherst. Blut tropft die perlmuttfarbenen Schuppen seines erschöpften Gesichts hinab, sowohl sein eigenes als auch das von anderen. Zwei pechschwarze Augen beobachten jede deiner Bewegungen, ohne zu blinzeln. Das dritte, das Mal eines {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, pulsiert bedrohlich hinter dem geschlossenen Lid in der Mitte seiner Stirn.{/n} "Tretet zurück! Sonst entfessle ich die Schrecken des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ozeans der Seelen{/g} und jage sie auf Euch! So wahr der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} mir helfe!"

languages.text: {n}Un homme de haute stature vous arrête d'un geste à votre approche. Du sang n'appartenant pas qu'à lui dégouline des écailles nacrées de son visage fatigué. Deux yeux d'un noir de jais surveillent tous vos mouvements sans cligner, quant au troisième, qui le désigne comme {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}, il pulse de manière menaçante derrière une paupière close au milieu de son front.{/n} « Reculez ! lance-t-il, ou je lâche les horreurs de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mer des Âmes{/g} sur vous ! L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} m'en soit témoin ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A tall man stops you with a gesture when you approach. Blood is trickling down the pearly scales of his weary face, and not just his own blood. Two jet-black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} upon you! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme de haute stature vous arrête d'un geste à votre approche. Du sang n'appartenant pas qu'à lui dégouline des écailles nacrées de son visage fatigué. Deux yeux d'un noir de jais surveillent tous vos mouvements sans cligner, quant au troisième, qui le désigne comme {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}, il pulse de manière menaçante derrière une paupière close au milieu de son front.{/n} « Reculez ! lance-t-il, ou je lâche les horreurs de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mer des Âmes{/g} sur vous !L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} m'en soit témoin ! »

languages.text: {n}当你接近时，一个高个子男人做了个手势，拦住了你。他的脸上写满了疲惫，鲜血正顺着他珍珠般的鳞片往下淌，而且不仅仅只有他自己的血。他两只漆黑的眼睛一眨不眨，注视着你的一举一动，而第三只眼睛，{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}命运的标记，正在他额头正中低垂的眼睑之后汹涌地跳动着。{/n}“退后！否则我就让你亲自体验{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}灵魂之海{/g}中的所有恐怖！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}为我作证！”
languages.original_text: {n}A tall man stops you with a gesture when you approach. Blood is trickling down the pearly scales of his weary face, and not just his own blood. Two jet-black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} upon you! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}当你接近时，一个高个子男人做了个手势，拦住了你。他的脸上写满了疲惫，鲜血正顺着他珍珠般的鳞片往下淌，既有他自己的血，也有别人的。他两只漆黑的眼睛一眨不眨，注视着你的一举一动，而第三只眼睛，{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}命运的标记，正在他额头正中低垂的眼睑之后汹涌地跳动着。{/n}“退后！否则我就让你亲自体验{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}灵魂之海{/g}中的所有恐怖！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}为我作证！”

languages.text: {n}こちらが近づくと、背の高い男は止まれというように身振りで示した。その真珠のような鱗の疲れた顔に、血が滴っていた。それも自分の血だけではない。漆黒のふたつの目が瞬きもせずに、こちらの一挙手一投足をまじまじと見て、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の運命の印である第三の瞳は、額の真ん中で閉じたまぶたの裏で威嚇するように脈動していた。{/n}「下がれ！近づけば、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}のあらゆる恐怖を解き放つ！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に誓って！」
languages.original_text: {n}A tall man stops you with a gesture when you approach. Blood is trickling down the pearly scales of his weary face, and not just his own blood. Two jet-black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} upon you! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}こちらが近づくと、背の高い男は手をスッと出して動きを制する。その真珠のような鱗の疲れた顔に、血が滴っていた。男の血と他の者の血だ。漆黒のふたつの目が瞬きもせずに、こちらの一挙手一投足をマジマジと見て、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の運命の印である第三の瞳は、額の真ん中で閉じたままのまぶたの裏で威嚇するように脈動していた。{/n}「下がれ！近づけば、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}のあらゆる恐怖を解き放つ！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に誓って！」

{n}こちらが近づくと、背の高い男は止まれというように身振りで示した。その真珠のような鱗の疲れた顔に、血が滴っていた。それも自分の血だけではない。漆黒のふたつの目が瞬きもせずに、こちらの一挙手一投足をまじまじと見て、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の運命の印である第三の瞳は、額の真ん中で閉じたまぶたの裏で威嚇するように脈動していた。{/n}「下がれ！近づけば、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}のあらゆる恐怖を解き放つ！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に誓って！」

languages.text: {n}Un hombre alto te detiene con un gesto al acercarte. Por las escamas perladas de su cara fluye sangre, y no solo suya. Dos ojos negros observan tus movimientos sin parpadear, mientras que el tercero, la característica marca de un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g}, late amenazador detrás del párpado que tiene en la frente.{/n} «¡Atrás! ¡De lo contrario, desataré los horrores del {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mar de Almas{/g}! ¡Al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} pongo por testigo!».
languages.original_text: {n}A tall man stops you with a gesture when you approach. Blood is trickling down the pearly scales of his weary face, and not just his own blood. Two jet-black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} upon you! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre alto te detiene con un gesto al acercarte. Por las escamas perladas de su cara fluye sangre, tanto suya como ajena. Dos ojos negros observan tus movimientos sin parpadear, mientras que el tercero, la característica marca de un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}, late amenazador detrás del párpado que tiene en la frente.{/n} «¡Atrás! ¡De lo contrario, desataré los horrores del {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}océano de las almas{/g}! ¡Al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} pongo por testigo!».

languages.text: {n}Uzun boylu bir adam, sen yaklaşırken bir el işaretiyle seni durduruyor. Yorgun yüzünün inci beyazlığındaki pullarından, bir başkasınınkiyle karışık kanlar sızıyor. Simsiyah iki gözü, bir an bile kırpılmadan her hareketini izliyor. Bu sırada bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı'nın{/g} kaderinin nişanesi niteliğindeki üçüncüsü, alnının ortasındaki kapalı kapağının ardında tehditkâr biçimde kıpırdanıyor.{/n} "Geri dur! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} şahidim olsun ki {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ruhlar Denizi'nde{/g} ne kadar dehşet varsa üzerine salarım!"
languages.original_text: {n}A tall man stops you with a gesture when you approach. Blood is trickling down the pearly scales of his weary face, and not just his own blood. Two jet-black unblinking eyes are watching your every move, and the third one, the mark of a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s fate, is menacingly pulsing behind the lowered lid in the middle of his forehead.{/n} "Step back! Or I will unleash all the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} upon you! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} be my witness!"

Simsiyah iki gözü, bir an bile kırpılmadan her hareketini izliyor. Bu sırada bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}'nın kaderinin nişanesi niteliğindeki üçüncüsü, alnının ortasındaki kapalı kapağının ardında tehditkâr biçimde kıpırdanıyor.{/n} "Geri dur! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} şahidim olsun ki {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ruhlar Denizi{/g}'nde ne kadar dehşet varsa üzerine salarım!"
